title: Red Hat security advisory (AV25-156)
description: Between March 17 and 23, 2025, Red Hat published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates to address vulnerabilities in the Linux kernel for the following products:
products: Red Hat Enterprise Linux  multiple versions and platforms
Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server for Power LE  multiple versions
Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server  multiple versions and platforms
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
